student1.text: Thanks to this platform, I passed TOPIK II with level 5! The practice tests were incredibly helpful and very similar to the real exam.
student1.name: Nguyen Minh Anh

student2.text: The vocabulary flashcards and grammar explanations made learning so much easier. I improved from level 3 to level 6 in just 6 months!
student2.name: Tran Thanh Ha

student3.text: As a beginner, I was worried about TOPIK I, but the structured courses and practice materials gave me confidence. I passed on my first try!
student3.name: Le Hoang Nam

hero.description2: Learn Korean effectively, achieve TOPIK certification quickly with our unique methodology and dedicated instructors

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Vitamin Korean Center - Your trusted partner on the journey to Korean language mastery
about.subtitle2: 6 reasons why thousands of students trust us
about.missionDesc: Provide high-quality Korean language training programs to help students achieve their learning goals and career development
about.visionDesc: Become Vietnam's leading Korean language training center, recognized for teaching quality and high TOPIK pass rates
about.valuesDesc: Quality - Trust - Dedication - Innovation in teaching methods, putting students at the center
about.feature1Desc: 100% Korean and Vietnamese instructors with high qualifications, 5-10 years of TOPIK teaching experience
about.feature1Desc2: 100% Korean and Vietnamese teachers with advanced degrees, 5-10 years TOPIK teaching experience
about.feature2Desc: Curriculum developed according to TOPIK standards, combining Korean textbooks and exclusive materials
about.feature2Desc2: Materials developed specifically for TOPIK, combining Korean textbooks and practical exercises
about.feature3Desc: Maximum 15 students per class, ensuring quality and attention to each student
about.feature3Desc2: Maximum 12-15 students/class, ensuring instructor attention to each student
about.feature4Desc: Flexible learning format: In-person at the center or online via Zoom
about.feature4Desc2: Study in-person or online, flexible schedule suitable for students and working professionals
about.feature5Desc: Regular assessment system, detailed progress reports, personalized roadmap consulting
about.feature5Desc2: Regular assessment system, detailed reports for parents and students
about.feature6Desc: Guaranteed TOPIK certification or free retake. TOPIK pass rate of 98%
about.feature6Desc2: Guaranteed TOPIK certification or free retake. Pass rate up to 98%

testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Genuine feedback from students
testimonials.student1Text: I tried many centers but only Vitamin helped me achieve TOPIK II Level 5. Teachers are very dedicated, materials are easy to understand with lots of practice exercises.
testimonials.student2Text: Small class sizes mean teachers care about each student. I was weak in writing but with detailed guidance I improved significantly. Achieved Level 4 after 4 months!
testimonials.student3Text: The program is very systematic and scientific. Vitamin's curriculum combines theory and practice well. Thank you Ms. Park for your dedicated guidance!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I register for courses?
faq.a1: You can register online through our website or contact our hotline for detailed consultation about courses suitable for your level and goals.
faq.a2: Yes, tuition includes complete textbooks, workbooks, and access to the online test system with thousands of questions.
faq.a3: Yes, we offer both in-person and online classes via Zoom. You can flexibly choose the format that suits your schedule.
faq.a4: Depending on level: TOPIK I about 3 months, TOPIK II level 3-4 about 4 months, and TOPIK II level 5-6 about 5 months.
faq.q5: What if I don't pass TOPIK?
faq.a5: We guarantee that if you attend fully and study seriously but don't achieve your TOPIK goal, you can retake the course for free until you achieve your desired result.

footer.about: Vietnam's leading Korean learning and test preparation platform with advanced AI technology
